sentences.sContent: Filling the cylinder with steam pushes the piston out.
sentences.sContent_eng: Filling the cylinder with steam pushes the piston out.
sentences.sCn: 填充汽缸的蒸汽将活塞推出。

sentences.sContent: The new series also includes a piston design that makes digressive forces for added pitch and roll control. This helps with performance over rough terrains and on off-road surfaces.
sentences.sContent_eng: The new series also includes a piston design that makes digressive forces for added pitch and roll control. This helps with performance over rough terrains and on off-road surfaces.
sentences.sCn: 新系列还包括一个活塞设计，它可降低阻力，增加间距和滚转控制，这有助于军用车辆在崎岖的地形和越野路面的表现。

phrases.pCn: 活塞式压缩机；往复式压缩机
活塞密封，活塞密封圈；活塞油封

remMethod.val: pis+ton(吨)→活塞运动能顶起上吨的东西→活塞

trans.tranOther: a part of an engine consisting of a short solid piece of metal inside a tube, which moves up and down to make the other parts of the engine move
